missionSuccessStatementOverride: The sattelite network around the planet is down. You can now operate without prying eyes observing your every move.
shortDescription:
This particular site is serving as command and controll facility for satellite based survailance of the planet's surface.

Disabling Setubal's sattelite network will greatly reduce local forces' ability to coordinate a response to your future operations.
longDescription: Due to the ongoing war, I expect hightened military presence Commander.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Kuritan communications facility and Escape
contractObjectiveList.description: Cripple the local Kuritan communications and sensor capacity to respond to future hostilities

dialogueContent.words:
<color=#FF7F7F>To the unknown BattleMech force: you are entering a restricted area.
Further approach will be considered a hostile action against the Draconis Combine.</color>
To the Kuritan command - We are in the employ of the Federated Commonwealth. Evacuate all buildings immediately.
Be cautious of the base defenses, Commander. I'm detecting a mix of 'Mech and vehicle signatures, supported by missile turret emplacements.
Excellent work, everyone. I'll give message to Captain Hippel; let's debrief back in orbit.
That's unfortunate. I'm pulling us out of this one, Commander.
They've got multiple units protecting this facility. Be careful not to get caught in an ambush.
Our mission here is complete. No need to linger; proceed to the evac zone.
Whatever you just hit - that took out their coms...
First building down - good work everyone!
<color=#FF7F7F>All personel! Immediately evacuate to shelters. Our defense force has been defeated!</color>
